title: Time is gold
author: Time is gold
content: https://support.lbank.site/hc/en-gb/articles/9994648266009UNIP(UNIPAY Token) will be listed on LBank Innovation ZoneAvatar LBank1 day ago UpdatedDear LBank users, UNIP(UNIPAY Token) will be listed on LBank at 15:00 on August 31, 2022 (UTC+8), the details are as follows: Trading Pair: UNIP/USDTTrading Area: Innovation ZoneDeposit Enable: 18:00 August 30, 2022 (UTC+8)Trading Open: 15:00 August 31, 2022 (UTC+8)Withdrawal Enable: 18:00 September 1, 2022 (UTC+8) About UNIP(UNIPAY Token)UNIPAY is a cryptocurrency aiming to be used as a major monetary instrument in the Indonesian commerce market. Both importers and exporters will be able to transfer transactions without having to go through financial or centralized institutions in order to avoid unnecessary processes and expensive commission fees, and UNIPAY will allow them to feel the simplicity by low fees, fast transmission speeds and simplified procedures.International trading companies can be free from exchange rates and exchange fees arising from the exchange of money to Rupiah, Indonesia's legal currency, if they remit the transaction amount to UNIPAY and receive it in UNIPAY. Website: https://unipayofficial.com/Blockchain browser: https://bscscan.com/token/0x966FF360433B2150f853A17F94397fD0523E2AD8Whitepaper: https://unipayofficial.com/unipay/whitepaper.pdf  Click here to download for iOS or Android LBank CommunityFind us on:Telegram: https://t.me/LBank_enTwitter: https://twitter.com/LBank_ExchangeFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/LBank.infoMedium: https://medium.com/LBankLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/lbank If you have problems, please contact LBank official email: service@lbank.info, and we will provide sincere, friendly and immediate service for you. We also welcome you to join LBank.info official English community to discuss the latest issue, (Telegram): https://t.me/LBank_en.Facebook Twitter LinkedInWas this article helpful? 0 out of 0 found this helpful
